title: Champion Update: Taric, the Shield of Valoran

replies.body: {{champion:44}} This is truly outragous
Is called shield of Valoran, doesn't even have a shield...
That's because now he IS the shield.
Did someone say {{champion:201}} ?
{{champion:44}} still looks truly truly outrageous. pink skin is even more fabulous

so let me get this straight... you've taken {{champion:44}}  "the gem knight" and turned him into {{champion:44}} THE SHIELD OF VALORAN!!! 

where is his shield...i mean the SHIELD of valoran should at least have a shield right?
fuck me {{champion:27}} has a shield and he is a bloody chemist.

the fuck rito
Now Taric IS the shield. {{item:1054}}
Did someone say {{champion:201}} ?

I'm not sure why people have such difficulty understanding a simple sentence as "The Shield of Valoran". I'm pretty sure if I was to say "The Chair of Demacia' then it's obvious we're talking about a chair, not a chair-wielding Demacian. Simple. Go back to school.
It's like people are misreading "A Shield from Valoran"

It's great that they gave him the much needed VU but everything becoming AoE makes me concerned for what his new stats will be to match. Maybe not including his shield in the VU means he'll be squishy like sona now? Because keeping his tanky stats as they currently are while adding these kit changes look really unbalanced. 

As for his new kit, he now has an AoE heal, AoE stun, double shield and AoE invunerability, and his ult looks like it still allows your teammates to move and attack seeing as they're not frozen like zhonya's.

So my biggest question now is... what happens to Bard{{champion:432}} from here? Seems like Taric just outperformed him in every way minus 'magical journey'.
you're basically just critising bard to tarics new update, Bard is still good in his own aspects, he has better poke, and his ult can stop enemies from moving while tarics can't.
Oh my fing god the pink taric skin art. He's definitely staring at Ezreal's ass.
:0  classic rito
Wow... rito actually did put Ez in the direction he's peering towards.
YASSS
kek
The one thing I wanted Taric to keep was his point and click stun...
If you notice on the bottom right side of the new pink {{champion:44}} skin, you can still see the old splash art on the phone...
spooky

Is it just me or does his new base splash make him look like Nicholas Cage?

Once again another butchery of a character. Do they even care anymore? He has nothing to do with gems or the earth anymore, he's just another shitty 'star' themed character. His ultimate isn't even unique, it's just a variant on Kayle/Kindred. 

This concept was 10000x better https://k33.kn3.net/taringa/1/6/1/3/8/8/67/---kevin-cr---/31A.jpg
His W, All abilities trigger from targeted ally does that mean his ult triggers from linked champ too?

I think this change is for the better and I'll definitely buy him :)
it's good to see a new skill shot stun with double the potential when laning with a partner.
Good job rito :D looking good :)
this is so much better ill actually play him now    qwer
i found that riot really like to give their champions protective ult. like kindred, or this man
From Gem Knight to Shield of Valoran, good job on your promotion Taric {{champion:44}}
